author: chamfay
name: Reality (Support Cinnamon 1.4)
description:
Reality is a cinammon theme with a look like real cinnamon.

changelog:

31/01/2012: Initial release.

- Change panel style, calendar, and others.

17/02/2012: New look, enjoy.

- Support cinnamon 1.3 version.

- Show popup menu in the center

- Many theme changes.

16/03/2012:

Add support for cinnamon 1.4
